pullRequest.body:
Add SecondCountableTopology.from_pseudometric_Lindelof, which is an instance that creates a second countable topology from a pseudometric Lindelof space. This allows one to synthesize that a pseudometric Lindelof space is a `SeparableSpace`.


---

GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go

nodes.body: Could you do it for pseudometrizable spaces instead of pseudometric spaces? (Same proof, just need to use `letI : PseudoMetricSpace X := TopologicalSpace.pseudoMetrizableSpacePseudoMetric X` at the beginning)

If desired, I can add the following by the way:

lemma pseudometrizable_SecondCountableTopology_iff_Lindelof [PseudoMetrizableSpace X] :
    SecondCountableTopology X ↔ LindelofSpace X  :=
  ⟨fun _ ↦ HereditarilyLindelof.to_Lindelof,
  fun _ ↦ SecondCountableTopology.from_pseudometrizable_Lindelof⟩

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/893a2c82-9230-44b7-b330-1607a6f8ef91) for commit e529f64de5b75e82a8246324589050147e13f877.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/918f6a26-b3c2-4341-97cb-cc9b90dfdc90/to/893a2c82-9230-44b7-b330-1607a6f8ef91) against commit 160455508bf64a8dd92e6288445b51e3c09247a5.

:v: JADekker can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7847115154/job/21415359984)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7847115154/job/21415359593)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7847115154/job/21415359770)

```suggestion
instance SecondCountableTopology.ofPseudoMetrizableSpaceLindelofSpace [PseudoMetrizableSpace X]
```
instance names are just one big block. Also, better follow the exact wording of the assumptions than trying to approximate them, because it's more predictable for users.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat : Add metric Lindelöf = second countable
